hero.title: Turn your store into a gifting destination.
hero.subtitle: Haady brings gift-ready customers to your products. Shoppers send gifts by @username - recipients confirm address and delivery time inside Haady - so you fulfill like a normal order.
hero.microTrust: Zero setup fees. Minutes to launch

bullets.conversions: More conversions: send by @username - no address friction at checkout
bullets.autoSync: Auto-sync: products, variants, inventory, and orders stay accurate
bullets.giftReady: Gift-ready upsell: notes, add-ons, wrap, bundles, curated collections
bullets.dashboard: Business dashboard: orders, status, payouts, and performance in one place

hero.microLine: Your brand stays front and center - you control pricing, availability, and delivery coverage.

panel.title: Gift orders at a glance
panel.subtitle: Stay ahead of demand and keep every store in sync.

socialProof.title: Built for stores that win gifting moments

points.trusted: Trusted by growing brands across KSA and GCC
points.seasons: Built for peak seasons: Eid, Ramadan, weddings, birthdays, new baby
points.fulfillment: Clear recipient confirmation means fewer failed deliveries and support tickets

problem.title: People love sending gifts, we help checkout feel effortless.
problem.subtitle: No awkward "what's their address?" at checkout. The recipient confirms delivery details inside Haady after purchase

solution.title: The Haady solution
solution.subtitle: A buyer-first gifting flow.
solution.body: With Haady, the buyer checks out in seconds. The recipient privately confirms address, delivery time, and instructions inside Haady - then you fulfill with clean, confirmed details.

features.title: Conversion-focused features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to turn gifting intent into revenue.

username.title: Gifts by @username
username.subtitle: Higher conversion. Cleaner orders.
username.description: Customers purchase without the recipient's address upfront. The recipient confirms where and when to receive it - so you reduce cancellations, support chats, and failed deliveries.

catalog.title: Sync your catalog automatically
catalog.subtitle: Always accurate products and stock.
catalog.description: Connect your platform and publish in minutes. Titles, images, variants, and inventory stay aligned - so shoppers only see what you can fulfill.

presentation.title: Turn products into gift experiences
presentation.subtitle: Increase basket size with add-ons and bundles.
presentation.description: Offer gift notes, wrapping, add-ons, and curated sets. Haady helps you package gifting choices in a way that naturally increases AOV.

management.title: Centralized gift order management
management.subtitle: Everything you need to fulfill with confidence.
management.description: Every order comes with context: occasion, message, recipient instructions, and confirmed delivery timing - plus status updates from preparing to delivered.

campaigns.title: Get featured during peak seasons
campaigns.subtitle: Visibility when demand spikes.
campaigns.description: Join seasonal collections and curated lists - Eid, Ramadan, graduations, weddings - so gift shoppers discover you at the right moment.

insights.title: Insights that help you grow
insights.subtitle: Know what sells - and when.
insights.description: Track performance by occasion, category, and product. Use insights to refine pricing, bundles, and assortment with confidence.

howItWorks.title: Go live in 3 simple steps
howItWorks.subtitle: Launch your gifting storefront in minutes.

connect.title: Connect your store
connect.description: Import products and sync inventory automatically.

launch.title: Start receiving gift orders
launch.description: Fulfill with confirmed delivery details and clear context.

integrations.title: Built to plug into your existing store
integrations.subtitle: Connect your store and manage gifting orders from one place.

zid.title: Zid
zid.description: Import catalog and keep stock updated

success.title: Success stories in the making
success.subtitle: Merchants grow gifting revenue without adding operational complexity.

highlight.title: Peak season ready
highlight.description: Launch collections for Eid, weddings, birthdays, and thank-you moments in days.

panel.title: Gifting impact
panel.subtitle: A snapshot of what merchants see after going live.

trust.title: Built for reliable fulfillment
trust.subtitle: Keep every gift on time with verified workflows.

items.confirm: Recipient confirms address and delivery time before fulfillment
items.status: Clear order statuses: Preparing -> Out for delivery -> Delivered
items.coverage: Coverage controls: locations, hours, blackout dates, availability
items.security: Secure business access and verified store profiles

trust.note: Less confusion. Fewer failed drops. Happier customers.

conversion.title: Ready to grow with gifting?
conversion.subtitle: Join Haady Business and start converting high-intent gift shoppers today.
conversion.micro: No setup fees - you can edit catalog, coverage, and settings anytime.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.subtitle: Answers to common questions about gifting with Haady.

address.question: Do I need the recipient's address at checkout?
address.answer: No - the buyer purchases instantly, and the recipient confirms address and timing inside Haady.

coverage.question: Can I choose where I deliver?
coverage.answer: Yes - set your coverage areas so customers only see what you can fulfill.

products.question: How do products get added to Haady?
products.answer: Connect your platform to import titles, prices, images, and variants. Inventory stays synced.

control.question: Can I control which products appear?
control.answer: Yes - you can publish only the items you want to sell through Haady.

brands.question: Is Haady only for big brands?
brands.answer: No - Haady is designed to help quality stores of all sizes grow through gifting.

delivery.question: Who handles delivery - Haady or my store?
delivery.answer: You fulfill like normal. Haady provides confirmed delivery details and gifting context.

pause.question: Can I pause Haady orders anytime?
pause.answer: Yes - control availability, coverage, and published products anytime.

createStoreModal.title: Create New Store
createStoreModal.description: Create a new Haady store. Required fields are marked with an asterisk.

helpText.name: The display name of the store.
helpText.slug: URL-friendly identifier. Auto-generated from name, but can be customized. Must be unique.
helpText.minimumOrderAmount: Optional. Minimum order amount in the store's currency.
helpText.description: Optional. Brief description of the store.

errors.tryAgain: An error occurred while creating the store. Please try again.

subtitle.welcome: Do you already sell online, or are you creating something new with Haady?
subtitle.choosePlatform: Select the e-commerce platform you want to connect

connectStore.title: Connect Existing Store
connectStore.description: Already selling on Salla, Zid, or Shopify? Link your account to auto-sync your products, inventory, and prices instantly.

createStore.title: Create New Store
createStore.description: Starting from scratch? Use Haady's powerful builder to set up your menu, define your delivery zones, and start selling today.

shopifyDialog.title: Enter Your Shopify Store Domain
shopifyDialog.description: You can enter just the shop name (e.g., "mystore") or the full domain.
shopifyDialog.label: Shop Domain

salla.description: Connect your Salla store to sync products, inventory, and orders automatically.

zid.description: Link your Zid store to import your catalog and manage everything from Haady.

shopify.description: Integrate your Shopify store for seamless product and order synchronization.

emptyState.title: Start searching
emptyState.description: Type in the search box above or select a category to filter your results.
emptyState.tryAgain: Try adjusting your search terms or try a different category.

1.title: New Feature: Product Sync
1.description: We've added automatic product synchronization with your store. Your products will now stay in sync automatically.

2.title: System Maintenance Complete
2.description: Scheduled maintenance has been completed successfully. All systems are now running smoothly.

3.title: Welcome to Haady Business
3.description: Thank you for joining Haady Business! Get started by connecting your first store.

4.title: Inventory Update Available
4.description: Your inventory levels have been updated. Check your dashboard to see the latest stock information.

5.title: New Order Received
5.description: You have received a new order. Review and process it from your orders dashboard.

6.title: Payment Processed
6.description: Your payment has been successfully processed. Your subscription is now active.

7.title: Store Connection Established
7.description: Your store connection has been successfully established. You can now sync your products.

8.title: Weekly Report Ready
8.description: Your weekly sales report is now available. View it in the reports section.

9.title: Product Sync Completed
9.description: Your product synchronization has been completed. 45 products have been synced successfully.

10.title: New Integration Available
10.description: We've added support for a new e-commerce platform. Connect your store now to get started.

11.title: Account Settings Updated
11.description: Your account settings have been successfully updated. Changes will take effect immediately.

12.title: Backup Completed
12.description: Your data backup has been completed successfully. Your information is safe and secure.

13.title: Performance Optimization
13.description: We've optimized your dashboard performance. You should notice faster loading times.

14.title: Security Alert
14.description: A new device has logged into your account. If this wasn't you, please change your password.

15.title: Feature Update
15.description: New features have been added to your dashboard. Explore them to enhance your workflow.

m1.title: New Customer Inquiry
m1.description: You have received a new customer inquiry about your products. Please respond within 24 hours.

m2.title: Order Question
m2.description: A customer has a question about their recent order. Check the order details and respond.

m3.title: Support Ticket Created
m3.description: A new support ticket has been created. Review and assign it to the appropriate team member.

m4.title: Product Review Received
m4.description: You have received a new product review. Check it out and respond if needed.

m5.title: Refund Request
m5.description: A customer has requested a refund for their order. Review the request and process accordingly.

m6.title: Shipping Update
m6.description: Your shipping provider has sent an update about a package delivery. Check the tracking information.

m7.title: Customer Feedback
m7.description: A customer has left feedback about their shopping experience. Read their comments.

m8.title: Account Verification
m8.description: A new customer account needs verification. Review and approve the account.

m9.title: Payment Issue
m9.description: There is a payment issue with one of your orders. Review and resolve the payment problem.

m10.title: Inventory Alert
m10.description: One of your products is running low on stock. Consider restocking soon to avoid out-of-stock situations.

m11.title: Help Request
m11.description: A customer needs help with using your platform. Provide assistance through the support channel.

m12.title: Security Notification
m12.description: Your account security settings have been updated. If this wasn't you, please review your account.

m13.title: Sales Report
m13.description: Your monthly sales report is ready. Review your performance metrics and insights.

m14.title: Settings Changed
m14.description: Your account settings have been modified. Review the changes to ensure everything is correct.

m15.title: Welcome Message
m15.description: Welcome to Haady Business! We're here to help you succeed. Feel free to reach out if you have any questions.

success.productsCreated: {count} new products added to your store

error.invalidOAuthUrlDesc: The OAuth URL format is incorrect. Please check the console for details.

error.invalidRedirectUriDesc: Zid requires HTTPS. Please set NEXT_PUBLIC_ZID_REDIRECT_URI with an HTTPS URL (use ngrok for local development)
error.failedToStartSync: Failed to start sync. Please try again.

info.featureComingSoonDesc: This feature is being developed and will be available soon.
